prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Bass, Organ, Synth Lead, Piano, but without Guitar.
captions:
Style 1:
No Guitar is present in this song, but it does feature Drums, Bass, Organ, Synth Lead, and Piano.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Drums, Bass, Organ, Synth Lead, and Piano, but no Guitar.

Style 3:
This piece is made up of Drums, Bass, Organ, Synth Lead, and Piano - no Guitar included.
